channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How a Conservative Texas District Rejected the Politics of Division
item.description: Many Americans are growing both exhausted and frightened by Trump’s scorched-earth, hyperpartisan, fire-ready-aim approach to the presidency.

item.title: Judge Hands Trump a Fifth Loss in His Effort to Halt Offshore Wind Projects
item.description: The court ruled that construction can restart on a wind farm off the coast of New York State. The Trump administration had ordered work to stop in Dec...

item.title: Trump administration sued over visa freeze on immigrants from 75 countries

item.title: The Trump Administration exempts new nuclear reactors from environmental review
item.description: The announcement comes just days after NPR revealed the administration had secretly rewritten safety and environmental standards.

item.title: Populist conservative Laura Fernández wins Costa Rica's presidential election

item.title: What Jared Kushner's 'New Gaza' plan includes, and what it leaves out
item.description: President Trump's son-in-law Jared Kushner laid out a plan for a "New Gaza." A close look suggests it makes room for fewer Palestinians and less housi...

item.title: Takeaways From the First Week of the Alexander Brothers Trial
item.description: Jurors in the sex trafficking case heard from the first witnesses and saw graphic evidence of the crimes the brothers are accused of.

item.title: Laura Fernández Wins Costa Rican Presidency
item.description: Laura Fernández’s victory was driven by a crisis in which Costa Rica’s reputation for peace has been tarred by record-breaking violence.

item.title: The Campaign Behind Trump’s Nigeria Strikes
item.description: A yearslong effort to convince the Trump administration that Christians are persecuted in the West African nation has shifted U.S. policy.
